## Introduction

This document demonstrates how to create a simple ggplot from the **mtcars** dataset.

```{r mtcars-plot, fig.width=7, fig.height=5}
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = disp, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = factor(cyl)), size = 3) +
  labs(
    title = "Miles per Gallon vs. Displacement",
    x = "Displacement (cu. in.)",
    y = "Miles per Gallon",
    color = "Cylinders"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
```
